General.Name: Shunya International Brand Consulting Beijing Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shunya International Martech (Beijing) Co., Ltd., provides marketing solutions, digital advertising, and data technology product services in China. The company provides digital marketing solutions, which include one-stop integrated marketing and communication services; digital advertising services, which include brand advertising, effect advertising delivery services, live broadcast operation, etc.; and data technology product services, which include JIRON technology platform to provide digital solutions. It offers its services to automotive, Internet information technology, IT communications, manufacturing, government, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Shunya International Brand Consulting (Beijing) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shunya International Martech (Beijing) Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Shunya International Martech (Beijing) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: CN02-B, No. 1 Balizhuang Dongli, Beijing, China, 100025
